document.full_text: chief executive ben verwaayen is preparing the next stage of telecom equipment maker alcatel-lucent's development armed with a refreshed product portfolio and a slimmer cost structure.
document.title: alcatel ceo looks to future growth
lines_and_colors: chief executive ben verwaayen is preparing the next stage of telecom equipment maker alcatel-lucent's development armed with a refreshed product portfolio and a slimmer cost structure.
